name: Rex Deck
author: Join
notes: They coming back.  Enough said ^_^  My Dino deck to counter the current Meta on ladder.  Everyone was using them things called Sylvans , MHeros, and Burn.  I belive I saw one or two Archfiends along the way.  Cursed Seal came in Clutch more than plenty of times.
main16: Cursed Seal of the Forbidden Spell
